Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.jemmy.image.ImageFactory
    Use ImageCapturer and ImageLoader interfaces instead.
    org.jemmy.interfaces.KeyTarget
    Use as(Keyboard.class)
    org.jemmy.interfaces.MouseTarget
    Use as(Mouse.class)
    org.jemmy.interfaces.Scroller
    Use Caret
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.jemmy.input.CaretImpl.DirectionToPosition
    Use ApproximateCaretOwner.ToPosition or PreciseCaretOwner.ToPosition
    org.jemmy.dock.DockGenerator
    Please use a generator from JemmySupport
    org.jemmy.image.ImageFactoryImpl
    ImageFactory interface is deprecated, use ImageCapturer and ImageLoader interfaces instead.
    org.jemmy.lookup.TrueLookup
    use org.jemmy.lookup.Any, this class will be dropped in Jemmy 3 v. 1.0
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.jemmy.control.Wrap.IMAGE_FACTORY_PROPERTY
    ImageFactory interface is deprecated, use ImageCapturer and ImageLoader interfaces instead.
    org.jemmy.input.ScrollerImpl.SCROLL_TIMEOUT
    Use AdvancedScroller.SCROLL_TIMEOUT
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.jemmy.control.Wrap.getImageFactory()
    Use getEnvironment().getImageFactory()
    org.jemmy.env.Environment.getImageFactory()
    ImageFactory interface is deprecated, use ImageCapturer and ImageLoader interfaces instead.
    org.jemmy.JemmyException.getInnerException()
    Use getCause()
    org.jemmy.JemmyException.getInnerThrowable()
    Use getCause();
    org.jemmy.interfaces.Scroll.scroller()
    Use CaretOwner.caret()
    org.jemmy.input.ScrollerImpl.scrollTo(double)
    Use to(double)
    org.jemmy.input.ScrollerImpl.scrollTo(Scroller.ScrollCondition)
    Use to(Caret.Direction)
    org.jemmy.control.Wrap.setImageFactory(ImageFactory)
    Use getEnvironment().setImageFactory(factory)
    org.jemmy.env.Environment.setImageFactory(ImageFactory)
    ImageFactory interface is deprecated, use ImageCapturer and ImageLoader interfaces instead.
    org.jemmy.control.Wrap.setInputFactory(ControlInterfaceFactory)
    Use getEnvironment().setInputFactory(factory)
    org.jemmy.interfaces.Caret.to(double)
    this is moved to CaretOwner
    org.jemmy.interfaces.Scroll.value()
    Use CaretOwner.position()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.jemmy.lookup.ByStringLookup(String, int)
    index is ignored
    org.jemmy.lookup.ByStringLookup(String, StringComparePolicy, int)
    index is ignored
